General.Name: Arbonia AG
General.Description: Arbonia AG engages in the supply of building components in Switzerland, Germany, and internationally. The company operates in two divisions, Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning (HVAC); and Doors. It offers flat and steel panel radiators, ventilation and air conditioning units, heat pumps, underfloor heating, fan coils, battery storage, gas fired unit heaters, radian panels, heat recovery, filter, evaporative coolers, and air handling units, as well as pipes for underfloor heating for use in residential and commercial areas. The company also provides construction glass, shower stalls, interir doors and frames, shower enclosures, functional doors, door frames, and door trims. In addition, it markets its products under the Arbonia, Baduscho, Brugman, Cicsa, Cirelius, Garant, Invado, Kermi, Koralle, Prolux, Prüm, RWD Schlatter, Sabiana, Superia, Termovent, Tecna, and Vasco brand names. The company was formerly known as AFG Arbonia-Forster-Holding AG and changed its name to Arbonia AG in December 2016. Arbonia AG was founded in 1874 and is based in Arbon, Switzerland.
